In the final week of August, 2018, we left our home to go traveling.

After packing up our tiny apartment and selling our belongings, we took the once in a lifetime opportunity to see the world.

We are unbelievably fortunate to be able to support ourselves from any location at a time in our lives when our home consists only of easily movable people and objects. This opportunity couldn't have happened without the support of our friends, family, and colleagues.

We are so incredibly grateful for all that you have done for us!

Love,
Sofiya and Brendan

Where are you going?

Our first series of stops will be in Europe, potentially until March 2019. Overall, our plans are very loose so come back to this site to see where we end up.

How long will you be away?

We don't know! We'll travel for a while, maybe settle down for a while, then maybe travel for a while, and finally return to a permanent home in Canada.

How can I follow along or stay in touch?

Come back to this website and read our Travel Tales or follow us on Facebook and Instagram!
